description: Expanding upon the multi-award winning Spin Ultra family, the Spin Ultra GTX is the perfect choice for logging some trail miles when the weather is not cooperating. The Gore-Tex invisible fit lining keeps inclement weather at bay, while the Vibram Megagrip outsole provides confidence inspiring traction on sloppy trails. Running or hiking, the Spin Ultra is the go-to option for foul-weather trail pursuits.
name: Scarpa Spin Ultra GTX - Mens (Prior Season)
